body.p: Changes the name of a procedural language.

section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: ALTER LANGUAGE name RENAME TO newname

section.title: Description
section.p: ALTER LANGUAGE changes the name of a procedural language. Only a superuser can rename languages.

plentry.pd: The new name of the language.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: There is no ALTER LANGUAGE statement in the SQL standard.
